charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
the outskirts of town, when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Allister at the
entrance to a cave.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_0200_:
Gengar... Gigantamax...
Swallow everything in darkness...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_0300_: Phew... I guess that’s all for today.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_0600_:
Oh... Thank goodness... I thought you were a
stranger for a moment there...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_0700_:
H-huh? What am I doing here? Well...I was
training with Gengar. This cave is perfect for it.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_0800_:
I-I’m not good with strangers...and Gengar could
swallow people up when he’s Gigantamaxed...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_0401_1000_:
They say a Gengar’s mouth becomes a passage to
the afterlife when it’s Gigantamaxed.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_0402_1200_:
This is just a rumor, but they say a Gengar’s
mouth becomes a passage to the afterlife when
it’s Gigantamaxed...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_1300_:
The afterworld, the spectral plane... There are
many names for it...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_1400_:
But I know it exists, because I’ve been
there before.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_1500_:
When I was four years old, I was badly hurt in
an accident and found myself wandering near
death’s doorstep...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_1600_:
I think Pokémon led me back to the world of
the living...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_1700_:
And perhaps I came back through a Gigantamax
Gengar’s mouth.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_1900_:
Ever since that accident, ghost Pokémon started
following me around.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_0402_2300_:
Yeah, s-some of them like to play tricks on
people, so it’s actually kind of fun.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_2400_:
Lots of people might think that ghost Pokémon
are scary...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_2500_:
But really, the reason why they spook people is
because they’re scared, too!
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_2600_:
They’re living in a world they’re not originally
from, so they have to follow different rules...
Being different can be scary, after all.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_2700_:
That’s probably why they like to stay invisible and
only come out at night... Because they’re scared
of humans.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_2800_: I can tell...because I’m like that, too...
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_2900_:
But I also want to learn from all the sync pairs
here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_3000_: I want to face my fears together with Gengar.
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_1201_3100_:
S-so, um...if you don’t mind...would you help
us out?
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_0401_3300_:
Th-thank you! Knowing you’ll be with us makes
me feel better already!
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_0302_3400_: Sure, if that’s what you want!
charaepi_ch0251_00_onion/2301_0402_3500_:
Th-thanks! I...I want to be more like you and
make more friends from now on!
